SELECT bm.bm_no, bm.bm_title, bm.bm_date, NVL(bs.bs_file,'파일 없음') bs_file, bm.bm_hit ,bm.bm_group, bm.bm_pos, bm.bm_step, bm.bm_email, bm.bm_pw ,bm.bm_writer, bm.bm_content from board_master2019 bm, board_sub2019 bs where bm.bm_no = bs.bm_no(+)
AND bm.bm_title LIKE '%'||{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm.bm_no = #{bm_no}
ORDER BY bm_group desc, bm_step asc
SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_sub2019 BOARD_SUB_PK)*/ bs_seq FROM board_sub2019 WHERE rownum=1),0)+1 bs_seq FROM dual
SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master2019 BOARD_MNO_PK)*/ bm_no FROM board_master2019 WHERE rownum=1),0)+1 bm_no FROM dual
SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master2019 I_GROUP)*/ bm_group FROM board_master2019 WHERE rownum=1 AND bm_group >0) ,0)+1 bm_group FROM dual
